translation.en: ♪ We can bring our worlds together ♪
translation.fr: Nos mondes, on peut les réunir

translation.en: ♪ Not quite ocean, not quite land ♪
translation.fr:
La mer ou presque
La terre ou presque

translation.en: ♪ So I go with the flow And I know who I am ♪
translation.fr:
Alors je suis le courant
Et je sais qui je suis

translation.en: ♪ Not quite ocean, not quite land ♪
translation.fr:
La mer ou presque
La terre ou presque

translation.en: ♪ So I go with the flow And I know who I am ♪
translation.fr:
Alors je suis le courant
Et je sais qui je suis

translation.en: then you go and I go, and then: Ta-da!
translation.fr: puis à toi et à moi, et :

translation.en: -You make a great dance partner, Pixie. -You too.
translation.fr:
- Tu es une super partenaire de danse.
- Toi aussi.

translation.en: Last one to the stream is a rotten fluffernut.
translation.fr:
Le dernier au ruisseau
est une noix pourrie.
On a soupiré en même temps.

translation.en: I just love it when the wind blows through my mane.
translation.fr: J'aime le vent dans ma crinière.

translation.en: Kelp, I just figured out something really, really, really,
translation.fr:
Kelp, je viens de penser
à un truc vraiment

translation.en: and drinking from the stream and warm breezes.
translation.fr:
boire dans le ruisseau
et les agréables brises.

translation.en: That means something big, don't you think?
-What do I think? -It means we're not just friends.
translation.fr:
- Je crois quoi ?
- Qu'on n'est pas juste amis,

translation.en: And as best friends, we need...
One for you and one for me.
translation.fr: Un pour toi et un pour moi.

translation.en: I like this look. Thank you, Pixie.
Now come on. I have something to show you.
translation.fr: J'ai une chose à te montrer.

translation.en: It's actually why I brought you here.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je t'ai amené ici.

- Tu n'as pas invité les autres ?
- Si.

translation.en: I wanted you to be the first to see.
translation.fr: Pour que tu voies ça avant.

translation.en: I could watch these all day.
translation.fr: Je n'arrête pas de les regarder.
On ne fait pas que regarder.

translation.en: I knew you would. Jump on one.
But the fun is staying on the cloud.
translation.fr: C'est plus amusant sur le nuage.

translation.en: Why do you keep hopping off?
Well, I guess because I don't really like riding on them.
translation.fr: Je n'aime pas vraiment être dessus.

translation.en: I don't like going that fast. And the bumps? Not for me.
translation.fr:
Je n'aime pas aller aussi vite.
Encore moins les tampons.

translation.en: I love riding on the clouds.
That's great. Then hop back on.
I like watching the clouds. And look.
Maybe they can ride with you, and I can watch.
translation.fr: Ils peuvent monter, et je regarderai.

translation.en: What do you think about that idea, Pixie? Pixie?
I think I don't want to play anymore.
translation.fr: Je n'ai plus envie de jouer.

translation.en: Kelp, where's Pixie's going? She said she had a surprise to show us.
translation.fr:
Kelp, où va Pétille ?
Elle avait une surprise pour nous.

translation.en: Knowing Pixie, it's gonna be really good.
Is it tacos? I hope it's tacos.
-Do you know what it is, Kelp? -Mm-hm.
Sad Kelp? That's not a good surprise.
translation.fr: Tu es triste ? Pas une bonne surprise.

translation.en: Pixie actually had a really good surprise.
And I know she really wanted to show you all,
but she just ran off, and I don't know why.
translation.fr: mais elle est partie, j'ignore pourquoi.

translation.en: Let's ask her. Where did she go?
I don't know, but we should find her and make sure she's okay.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas. Mais trouvons-la
pour être sûrs que ça va.

translation.en: -Okay. Let's go. -We'll check all her favorite places.
translation.fr:
- OK.
- Allons à ses endroits favoris.

translation.en: He was supposed to like the fun clouds because I like the fun clouds.
translation.fr:
Il était censé aimer les nuages
parce que je les aime.

translation.en: I can tell you're best friends because you like to walk the same.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes meilleurs amis
car vous marchez pareil.

translation.en: I don't think she's in the log.
translation.fr: Elle est pas dans le tronc.

translation.en: Well, it's official. She's not at the market.
translation.fr: C'est officiel. Elle n'est pas au marché.

translation.en: I still don't know why she ran off like that.
It is strange. Did anything happen before she ran off?
translation.fr:
C'est étrange.
S'est-il passé quelque chose avant ?

translation.en: Well, first I made my bed, cleaned my room, danced a little,
translation.fr:
D'abord, j'ai fait mon lit,
rangé ma chambre, dansé,

translation.en: had squid-ink pancakes for breakfast, then I--
Remember when we used to drink from the stream together?
I used to have a best friend like that.
Aw. You're on his face right now.
Uh... I don't think she's in the hole.
translation.fr: Elle n'est pas dans ce trou.

translation.en: You know, I don't either anymore,
translation.fr: Je ne crois pas non plus,

translation.en: but it does feel good to dig.
you two shared your love of dancing, drinking from streams,
translation.fr: vous avez dansé, bu au ruisseau

translation.en: Yep. Then she showed me the fun clouds.
translation.fr: Puis elle m'a montré les nuages.

translation.en: She had a lot of fun riding around on them.
translation.fr: Elle s'est amusée en montant dessus.

translation.en: But if she suddenly ran off, something must have upset her.
translation.fr:
Mais si elle est partie,
c'est qu'elle était contrariée.

translation.en: -The good news is that she was here. -Yeah.
We need to keep checking in her favorite places.
Keep doing everything together, little frogs.
Don't lose your best friend, like I did.
translation.fr:
Ne perdez pas votre meilleur ami,
comme moi.

translation.en: I'm thinking about Kelp so much it's like I can hear him.
translation.fr:
Je pense tellement à Kelp
que je crois l'entendre.

translation.en: I knew she'd be at the blindersploot tree.
translation.fr: Elle était à l'arbre à blindeursplout.

translation.en: Hey, Juni. Why don't we hang back?

translation.fr:
- Pourquoi ?
- Il leur faut un moment.

translation.en: Of course I did. You're my best friend.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. Tu es ma meilleure amie.

translation.en: I was sad that we couldn't be best friends anymore.
translation.fr:
J'étais triste
qu'on ne soit plus meilleurs amis.

translation.en: Why can't we be best friends anymore?
translation.fr: Pourquoi on ne le serait plus ?

translation.en: I'm looking, but I don't get it.
translation.fr: Je regarde, mais je ne vois pas.

translation.en: Best friends are supposed to do and like all the same things.
translation.fr:
Les meilleurs amis doivent faire et aimer
les mêmes choses.

translation.en: Look at the way these frogs hop the same.
translation.fr: Ces grenouilles sautent de la même façon.

translation.en: I loved the fun clouds, but you didn't like them at all.
translation.fr: J'aime les nuages dansants, mais pas toi.

translation.en: So we can't be best friends.
translation.fr: On ne peut pas être meilleurs amis.

translation.en: Really? I'm not sure that's true.
translation.fr: Vraiment ? Je n'en suis pas sûr.

translation.en: Huh. One liked splashing in the water, the other one didn't.
translation.fr:
L'une a sauté dans l'eau,
mais l'autre non.

translation.en: I think we are best friends like the frogs. You know how I know?
translation.fr:
On est meilleurs amis comme elles.
Tu sais pourquoi ?

translation.en: Because we had so much fun today.
And when you ran off, I was worried and I missed you.
translation.fr: et quand tu es partie, tu m'as manqué.

translation.en: And it's because we're so different that we became friends in the first place.
translation.fr:
C'est parce qu'on est différents
qu'on est devenus amis.

translation.en: Yeah. If I had been just like you,
then you wouldn't have had to teach me about being a unicorn.
translation.fr:
tu ne m'aurais pas appris
à être une licorne.

translation.en: Maybe it's even a good thing that we're a little different?
And we can still be best friends?
I took off my horn topper.
-Thank you, Kelp. -What are best friends for?
translation.fr:
- Merci.
- À quoi servent les meilleurs amis ?

translation.en: -Five, six, seven, eight. -Five, six, seven, eight.
translation.fr: Cinq, six, sept, huit. On danse…

translation.en: Here we are in my sunny spot.
Feel the warm sun on your back.
translation.fr: Sens la chaleur sur ton dos.

translation.en: Ollie, can I breathe out now?
That's why it's always so special when I see it.
translation.fr: C'est rare, quand je le vois.

translation.en: Oh! Look, it sprays water too.
That's not a floating white rock. That's the White Whale.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas un rocher.
C'est une baleine blanche.

translation.en: [Kelp] Yeah. The White Whale is my friend.
translation.fr: La baleine blanche est mon amie.

translation.en: They come by once a year on their way to warmer waters.
translation.fr: Elle passe par ici une fois par an.

translation.en: There must be so much magic under the sea, and I don't know any of it.
translation.fr:
Ça doit être magique sous la mer,
et je n'y connais rien.

translation.en: I agree. The sea is magical.
translation.fr: C'est vrai. La mer est magique.

translation.en: And the White Whale is the best.
translation.fr: Et la baleine blanche est la plus belle.

translation.en: We always throw a party and cheer as they swim past.
translation.fr: On fait une fête lorsqu'elle passe.

translation.en: But the White Whale's there, and you're here.
translation.fr: Mais elle est là-bas, et tu es ici.

translation.en: Oh, no. You'll miss the whole thing.
translation.fr: Oh, non. Tu vas tout manquer.

translation.en: Nah, they're still pretty far away.
That's why they look so small.
but they're as big as maybe a hundred of these clouds.
translation.fr: est aussi grosse que cent nuages.

translation.en: It would be such a dream to see the White Whale up close like that.
translation.fr:
Ce serait un rêve de voir
la baleine blanche de près.

translation.en: Imagine, I might even be able to reach out and shake their fin.
translation.fr:
Imagine, je pourrais même
toucher sa nageoire.

translation.en: But we all know that could never happen.
Why could what never happen, I said?
Why can't Ollie come underwater with me and meet the White Whale?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi Ollie ne peut pas
aller sous l'eau avec moi ?

translation.en: [Kelp] I'm a unicorn. I go underwater.
translation.fr: Je suis une licorne qui va sous l'eau.

translation.en: [Ollie] Do you really think I could?
But before we met him, unicorns didn't even go out in the rain.
translation.fr:
Avant de le rencontrer, les licornes
ne sortaient pas sous la pluie.

translation.en: What about breathing? How are you gonna breathe underwater?
translation.fr: Et comment tu vas respirer sous l'eau ?

translation.en: Oh, right. That whole breathing thing.
translation.fr: C'est vrai. Cette histoire de respiration.

translation.en: I can make you a bubble, for your head.
translation.fr: Je peux faire une bulle pour ta tête.

translation.en: Yeah, Kelp can make me a bubble.
translation.fr: Kelp peut me faire une bulle.

translation.en: Well, I guess I'm here to help however I can.
But before we all help, what's the White Whale?
translation.fr:
Mais avant,
c'est quoi la baleine blanche ?

translation.en: I see a white dot or something.
You wanna go under the sea to meet a white dot?
translation.fr:
Tu veux aller sous l'eau
voir un point blanc ?

translation.en: Actually, it's not a white dot.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un point blanc.

translation.en: It's Kelp's friend the White Whale.
And up close, they're the size of a hundred elevator clouds.
translation.fr: De près, elle a la taille de cent nuages.

translation.en: They're bigger now. They're getting closer.
if we're gonna make you underwater-ready in time.
There, I'm ready to get underwater-ready.
translation.fr: Voilà. Je suis prêt à aller sous l'eau.

translation.en: -What's next? -I teach you how to swim.
translation.fr:
- Et maintenant ?
- Je t'apprends à nager.

translation.en: This is teaching him how to swim?
Yep. In the water, if he kicks his legs like this,
translation.fr: Dans l'eau, s'il bat des sabots,

translation.en: Ollie, if this is gonna work,
you have to actually go in the water.
But I, uh, just did my hooves.
translation.fr: Mais je me suis verni les sabots.

translation.en: Water isn't gonna ruin your hoof polish.
translation.fr: L'eau ne va pas abîmer ton vernis.
Le sable est comme une éponge.

translation.en: Come on, Ollie. Just take one step.
That's it. Now the other hoof.
I did it. I'm in the water.
translation.fr: Ça y est. Je suis dans l'eau.

translation.en: You've only got two hooves in the water.
translation.fr: Tu n'as que deux sabots dans l'eau.

translation.en: You need your whole body in the water if you're gonna meet the White Dot.
translation.fr:
Il faut que tout ton corps y soit
pour voir le point blanc.

translation.en: -She means the White Whale. -Yeah, the White Whale Dot.
translation.fr:
- La baleine blanche.
- Oui, la baleine point blanc.

translation.en: Keep going. One step at a time.
translation.fr: Continue. Un pas à la fois.

translation.en: Now all you've gotta do is kick like we practiced.
translation.fr:
Maintenant,
tu n'as plus qu'à battre des sabots.

translation.en: I'm going to go underwater and meet the White Whale.
translation.fr:
Je vais sous l'eau
voir la baleine blanche.

translation.en: The next time I see you, this hoof will be the hoof
translation.fr: La prochaine fois qu'on se voit, ce sabot

translation.en: that's shaken the fin of the White Whale.
translation.fr:
aura serré la nageoire
de la baleine blanche.

translation.en: It'll feel a little different putting your head under the water.
translation.fr:
Ce sera différent
de mettre ta tête sous l'eau.
J'ai déjà emmené des bulles sous l'eau.

translation.en: But you've never taken a bubble that was around a unicorn's head.
translation.fr: Mais pas autour de la tête d'une licorne.

translation.en: We don't know what it can and can't do.
translation.fr: On ignore ce qu'elle peut faire.

translation.en: Not even the grown-up unicorns understand the spark behind your head bubble.
translation.fr:
Même les adultes ignorent
la magie de ta bulle.

translation.en: Don't worry, Ollie. We can still find a way.
translation.fr: Ne t'en fais pas. On trouvera un moyen.

translation.en: There you are. We've been looking everywhere.
translation.fr: Te voilà. On te cherchait partout.

translation.en: They're almost here. You don't wanna miss the White Whale, do you?
translation.fr:
Elle arrive.
Ne rate pas la baleine blanche.

translation.en: It's okay, Kelp. You need to go. I don't want you to miss out.
translation.fr: Vas-y, Kelp. Je ne veux pas t'en priver.

translation.en: But if I have your head bubble, what will you do?
translation.fr: Si j'ai ta bulle, que feras-tu ?

translation.en: Tell the White Whale I'll see them next year.
translation.fr: Je verrai la baleine l'an prochain.

translation.en: Someone's gotta come already, or we'll all miss them.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un doit venir, ou on va les rater.

translation.en: Ollie's coming. Take care of him, will you?
translation.fr: Ollie y va. Occupez-vous de lui.

translation.en: It's okay, Ollie. We've got you.
I can't wait for you to meet all my friends.
translation.fr: J'ai hâte que tu rencontres mes amis.

translation.en: We've gotta make sure my head bubble works on you.
Hi, Theo. This is my friend Ollie.
translation.fr: Salut, Theo. C'est mon ami Ollie.

translation.en: Oh, Mom, Dad, look who I brought.
translation.fr: Maman, papa, regardez qui est là.

translation.en: This is Ollie. He's a unicorn like Kelp.
translation.fr: Ollie est une licorne comme Kelp.

translation.en: Why, hello, Ollie. We've heard a lot about you.
translation.fr: Bonjour, Ollie. On as entendu parler de toi.

translation.en: Kelp's told me so much about his family.
translation.fr: Kelp m'a parlé de sa famille.

translation.en: I'm so happy to finally meet you.
Why not? He loves the White Whale.
translation.fr: Pourquoi ? Il aime la baleine blanche.

translation.en: He's up with Pixie and Juniper.
There was only one of these bubble thingies.
And it's Ollie's dream to meet the White Whale and shake their fin.
translation.fr:
C'était le rêve d'Ollie
de rencontrer la baleine blanche.

translation.en: Kelp made my dream come true.

translation.fr:
- Elle est là !
- On t'aime, baleine blanche !

translation.en: They really are the size of a hundred elevator clouds.
translation.fr:
Elle fait vraiment
la taille de cent nuages.
